snippet: A naturally reserved woman who dislikes public speaking, she has taken more opportunities to defend her film and its portrayal of torture as a tactic used by the C.I.A. in its manhunt.
abstract: A naturally reserved woman who dislikes public speaking, she has taken more opportunities to defend her film and its portrayal of torture as a tactic used by the C.I.A. in its manhunt.

headline.main: Kathryn Bigelow Steps Up Defense of "Zero Dark Thirty"
